alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 10:44AM EST until March 02 at 12:20PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun. .Water levels are forecast to crest soon on the Green River. At Paradise, river levels are cresting just above moderate flood stage, while at Calhoun, the crest will be in minor flood. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 386.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:15 AM CST Sunday was 386.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 386.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will drop to minor flooding Monday evening, and then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
